hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Fish Bottle#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Underwater Left Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #2# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Map of the Bottom of the Well# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Purple Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: May the way of the Hero lead to the Triforce.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Purple Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Purple Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #4# major items.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: Dodongo's Cavern is much easier and faster to clear as Adult.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that Anju needs to stop losing her chickens.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a #generic grotto#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a #single Upgrade Deku Scrub#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Deku Shield# and #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Zora Tunic#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Bow#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #treasure chest game# grants #a Piece of Heart#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Zora Tunic#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Deku Stick#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.
